name: Surionlifter!
description:
Surionlifter! is my first Game maker studio 2 project and a remake of Dan Gorlin's classic Choplifter.

The North empire had kidnapped the citizens. you must take on KUH-1 Surion and rescue them all.

During the rescue you'll encounter Tanks, AA guns, Interceptors, Bombers, and helicopters trying to stop you. always take a look at the radar and fight or avoid them wisely.

3 Surions are available in each levels. the game ends if you lose 3 Surions before getting all men or rescued men are less than the dead ones.

Tips :

- Shortly pressing rotating key centers the helicopter. when the helicopter is facing the screen It can drop bombs to destroy tanks, and the helicopter's hitbox decreases significantly. this hitbox change is useful when avoiding things or landing around the hostages to pick them up.

- Unlike the original, the playfield is wrapped around. you can either move to left or right.

- AA guns can't attack you when you are close to the ground. Use it wisely if there are hostages around them.

This game supports controller.
